is sufficient and the deposit is not expiring","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"getCurrentState()":{"details":"We implement this because contracts don't handle foreign enums well","return":"The 0-indexed state from the DepositStates enum"},"getOwnerRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address)":{"params":{"_redeemer":"The assumed owner of the deposit's TDT "},"return":"The amount in TBTC needed to redeem the deposit."},"getRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address)":{"details":"Will revert if redemption is not possible by msg.sender.","params":{"_redeemer":"The deposit redeemer. "},"return":"The amount in TBTC needed to redeem the deposit."},"inActive()":{"return":"True if state is ACTIVE, fale otherwise."},"increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8)":{"details":"This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE","params":{"_newOutputValueBytes":"The new output's value","_previousOutputValueBytes":"The previous output's value"},"return":"True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert"},"lotSizeSatoshis()":{"return":"uint256 lot size in satoshi"},"lotSizeTbtc()":{"return":"uint256 lot size in erc20 decimal (max 18)"},"notifyCourtesyCall()":{"details":"Calls out to the system for oracle info","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyCourtesyTimeout()":{"details":"This is treated as an abort, rather than fraud","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyDepositExpiryCourtesyCall()":{"details":"This initiates a courtesy call","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyFraudFundingTimeout()":{"details":"This is not a funder fault. The signers have faulted, so the funder shouldn't fund","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyFundingTimeout()":{"details":"This is considered a funder fault, and we revoke their bond","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyRedemptionProofTimeout()":{"details":"This is considered fraud, and is punished","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifySignatureTimeout()":{"details":"This is considered fraud, and is punished","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifySignerSetupFailure()":{"details":"We rely on the keep system punishes the signers in this case","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation()":{"details":"Calls out to the system for oracle info","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"provideBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint8,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify funding","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"Single bytestring of 80-byte bitcoin headers, lowest height first","_fundingOutputIndex":"Index of funding output in _txOutputVector (0-indexed)","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block","_txIndexInBlock":"Transaction index in the block (0-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"},"return":"True if no errors are thrown"},"provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest","params":{"_preimage":"The sha256 preimage of the revert"},"provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint8,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify (0-indexed)","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block","_txIndexInBlock":"Transaction index in the block (0-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"},"return":"True if no errors are thrown"},"provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"details":"ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest","params":{"_preimage":"The sha256 preimage of the digest","_r":"Signature R value","_s":"Signature S value","_signedDigest":"The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple","_v":"Signature recovery value"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"provideRedemptionProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"The signers will be penalized if this is not called","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block","_txIndexInBlock":"The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"}},"provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called","params":{"_r":"Signature R value","_s":"Signature S value","_v":"Signature recovery value"},"return":"True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert"},"provideSPVFraudProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,uint8,bytes)":{"details":"We strong prefer ECDSA fraud proofs","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block","_targetInputIndex":"Index of the input that spends the custodied UTXO","_txIndexInBlock":"The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction()":{"details":"For interface, reading auctionValue will give a past value. the current is better","return":"True if successful, revert otherwise"},"remainingTerm()":{"details":"The value is not guaranteed since block.timestmap can be lightly manipulated by miners.","return":"The remaining term of the deposit in seconds. 0 if already at term"},"requestRedemption(bytes8,bytes20)":{"details":"The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx","params":{"_outputValueBytes":"The 8-byte LE output size","_redeemerPKH":"The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds"},"return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"retrieveSignerPubkey()":{"details":"We store the pubkey as 2 bytestrings, X and Y.","return":"True if successful, otherwise revert"},"signerFee()":{"return":"Fee amount in TBTC"},"transferAndRequestRedemption(bytes8,bytes20,address)":{"details":"The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx and pays for the redemption","params":{"_finalRecipient":"The address to receive the TDT and later be recorded as deposit redeemer.","_outputValueBytes":"The 8-byte LE output size","_redeemerPKH":"The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds"}},"utxoSize()":{"return":"Uint256 UTXO size."}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"createNewDeposit(address,address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"The system can spin up a new deposit"},"exitCourtesyCall()":{"notice":"Goes from courtesy call to active"},"getCurrentState()":{"notice":"Get the integer representing the current state"},"getOwnerRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address)":{"notice":"Get TBTC amount required for redemption assuming _redeemer                     is this deposit's TDT owner."},"getRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address)":{"notice":"Get TBTC amount required by redemption by a specified _redeemer"},"inActive()":{"notice":"Check if the Deposit is in ACTIVE state."},"increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed"},"lotSizeSatoshis()":{"notice":"Get the Deposit BTC lot undercollateralized"},"notifyCourtesyTimeout()":{"notice":"Notifies the contract that the courtesy period has elapsed"},"notifyDepositExpiryCourtesyCall()":{"notice":"Notifies the contract that its term limit has been reached"},"notifyFraudFundingTimeout()":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract no funding proof was submitted during funding fraud"},"notifyFundingTimeout()":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the funder has failed to send BTC"},"notifyRedemptionProofTimeout()":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof"},"notifySignatureTimeout()":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature"},"notifySignerSetupFailure()":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that signing group setup has timed out"},"notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation()":{"notice":"Notify the contract that the signers are undercollateralized"},"provideBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,uint8,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof to activate the deposit                             This is the happy-path of the funding flow. It means that we have succeeded"},"provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud"},"provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,bytes32,bytes32,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud during funding"},"provideRedemptionProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption"},"provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested"},"provideSPVFraudProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,uint8,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the deposit of fraud via an SPV proof"},"purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction()":{"notice":"Closes an auction and purchases the signer bonds. Payout to buyer, funder, then signers if not fraud"},"remainingTerm()":{"notice":"Retrieve the remaining term of the deposit in seconds."},"requestRedemption(bytes8,bytes20)":{"notice":"Anyone can request redemption"},"retrieveSignerPubkey()":{"notice":"we poll the Keep contract to retrieve our pubkey"},"signerFee()":{"notice":"Get the signer fee for the createNewDeposit(address,address,address.details: This should be called by an approved contract, not a developer

exitCourtesyCall().details: Only callable if collateral is sufficient and the deposit is not expiring

getCurrentState().details: We implement this because contracts don't handle foreign enums well
getCurrentState().return: The 0-indexed state from the DepositStates enum

params._redeemer: The assumed owner of the deposit's TDT

getOwnerRedemptionTbtcRequirement(addres.return: The amount in TBTC needed to redeem the deposit.

getRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address).details: Will revert if redemption is not possible by msg.sender.
getRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address).return: The amount in TBTC needed to redeem the deposit.

inActive().return: True if state is ACTIVE, fale otherwise.

increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).details: This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE
increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

lotSizeTbtc().return: uint256 lot size in erc20 decimal (max 18)

notifyCourtesyCall().details: Calls out to the system for oracle info

notifyCourtesyTimeout().details: This is treated as an abort, rather than fraud

notifyFraudFundingTimeout().details: This is not a funder fault. The signers have faulted, so the funder shouldn't fund

notifyFundingTimeout().details: This is considered a funder fault, and we revoke their bond

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout().details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

notifySignatureTimeout().details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

notifySignerSetupFailure().details: We rely on the keep system punishes the signers in this case

notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation().details: Calls out to the system for oracle info

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,byte.details: Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify funding

params._bitcoinHeaders: Single bytestring of 80-byte bitcoin headers, lowest height first
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,byte.return: True if no errors are thrown

provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,byt.details: ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest

params._preimage: The sha256 preimage of the digest
params._signedDigest: The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple

provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes.details: Takes a pre-parsed transaction and calculates values needed to verify funding

params._bitcoinHeaders: Single bytestring of 80-byte bitcoin headers, lowest height first
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of transaction inclusion in a block
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

provideFraudBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes.return: True if no errors are thrown

provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,byte.details: ECDSA is NOT SECURE unless you verify the digest

params._preimage: The sha256 preimage of the digest
params._signedDigest: The digest signed by the signature vrs tuple

provideRedemptionProof(bytes4,bytes,byte.details: The signers will be penalized if this is not called

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block
params._txIndexInBlock: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.details: The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called
provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

provideSPVFraudProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,.details: We strong prefer ECDSA fraud proofs

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block
params._targetInputIndex: Index of the input that spends the custodied UTXO
params._txIndexInBlock: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction().details: For interface, reading auctionValue will give a past value. the current is better

remainingTerm().details: The value is not guaranteed since block.timestmap can be lightly manipulated by miners.
remainingTerm().return: The remaining term of the deposit in seconds. 0 if already at term

requestRedemption(bytes8,bytes20).details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx

params._redeemerPKH: The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds

retrieveSignerPubkey().details: We store the pubkey as 2 bytestrings, X and Y.

transferAndRequestRedemption(bytes8,byte.details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx and pays for the redemption

params._finalRecipient: The address to receive the TDT and later be recorded as deposit redeemer.
params._redeemerPKH: The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds

createNewDeposit(address,address,address.notice: The system can spin up a new deposit

exitCourtesyCall().notice: Goes from courtesy call to active

getCurrentState().notice: Get the integer representing the current state

getOwnerRedemptionTbtcRequirement(addres.notice: Get TBTC amount required for redemption assuming _redeemer                     is this deposit's TDT owner.

getRedemptionTbtcRequirement(address).notice: Get TBTC amount required by redemption by a specified _redeemer

inActive().notice: Check if the Deposit is in ACTIVE state.

increaseRedemptionFee(bytes8,bytes8).notice: Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed

lotSizeSatoshis().notice: Get the Deposit BTC lot size.

lotSizeTbtc().notice: Get the Deposit ERC20 lot size.

notifyCourtesyCall().notice: Notify the contract that the signers are undercollateralized

notifyCourtesyTimeout().notice: Notifies the contract that the courtesy period has elapsed

notifyDepositExpiryCourtesyCall().notice: Notifies the contract that its term limit has been reached

notifyFraudFundingTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract no funding proof was submitted during funding fraud

notifyFundingTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the funder has failed to send BTC

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof

notifySignatureTimeout().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature

notifySignerSetupFailure().notice: Anyone may notify the contract that signing group setup has timed out

notifyUndercollateralizedLiquidation().notice: Notify the contract that the signers are undercollateralized

provideBTCFundingProof(bytes4,bytes,byte.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of a funding proof to activate the deposit                             This is the happy-path of the funding flow. It means that we have succeeded

provideECDSAFraudProof(uint8,bytes32,byt.notice: Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud

provideFundingECDSAFraudProof(uint8,byte.notice: Anyone can provide a signature that was not requested to prove fraud during funding

provideRedemptionProof(bytes4,bytes,byte.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption

provideRedemptionSignature(uint8,bytes32.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested

provideSPVFraudProof(bytes4,bytes,bytes,.notice: Anyone may notify the deposit of fraud via an SPV proof

purchaseSignerBondsAtAuction().notice: Closes an auction and purchases the signer bonds. Payout to buyer, funder, then signers if not fraud

remainingTerm().notice: Retrieve the remaining term of the deposit in seconds.

retrieveSignerPubkey().notice: we poll the Keep contract to retrieve our pubkey

signerFee().notice: Get the signer fee for the Deposit.

utxoSize().notice: Get the size of the funding UTXO.
